subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Without money to pursue big-name free agents, the Mets could trade R.A. Dickey, who told Jon Stewart on “The Daily Show” that he wants to stay in New York.
snippet: Without money to pursue big-name free agents, the Mets could trade R.A. Dickey, who told Jon Stewart on “The Daily Show” that he wants to stay in New York.
